On Jun 18, 2009, at 8:19 AM, johnzabroski wrote:

> http://www.google.com/#hl=en&q=site%3Atech.groups.yahoo.com 
> %20inurl:rest-discuss
>
> I noticed that Google has recently (perhaps even as recent as last  
> night) changed their URI formatting.  They killed the question mark  
> and are now using fragment identifiers for Google Search.
>
